titles.title: CB 18 Thine, O Lord, Is the Greatness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
THINE, O LORD, IS THE GREATNESS.
Thine, O Lord, is the power. Thine, O Lord is the
glory, the victory, and the majesty:
For all that is in the heavens and earth is Thine.
Thine is the kingdom, O Lord,
And Thou art exalted as head above all.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Both riches and honor come of Thee,
And Thou reignest over all; and in Thine hand is
power and might; and in Thine hand it is to make
great, and to give strength unto all.
Therefore, our God, we thank Thee, we thank
Thee, we thank Thee, and praise Thy glorious
name.
